booth_types.name: Post-it Wall
booth_types.desc: Post your thoughts on the exhibition in this booth!

booth_types.name: True Or False
booth_types.desc: Bust some common myths and misconceptions in this booth!

booth_types.name: Basketball
booth_types.desc: Want to learn and stay active at the same time? This booth is for you!

booth_types.name: Strings
booth_types.desc: Express your views by tying knots in this one-of-a-kind booth!

booth_types.name: Artificial Intelligence (AI) Visualization
booth_types.desc: Explore your creativity in transforming urban spaces with our agent to guide you along the way!

booth_types.name: City Planner: A Game on Singapore's Urban Scenarios
booth_types.desc: Design and solve real-world urban challenge scenarios around Singapore. Think you got what it takes?

booth_types.name: Digital Canvas
booth_types.desc: A designated space to draw any ideas of what your future of Singapore would be. Let your creativity go wild!

booth_types.name: LEGO play area
booth_types.desc: Express your views by tying knots in this one-of-a-kind booth!

booth_types.name: An Urban Journey: A Virtual Reality (VR) experience
booth_types.desc: Using the power of VR, take a step of what Singapore's future can be through your own eyes in this flagship exhibition!

booth_types.name: Photo Booths
booth_types.desc: Take a picture of your exhibition journeys with your friends and family!

booth_types.name: Redemption Booth
booth_types.desc: Earned anything in the booths or minigames in the exhibition? Here's where can you earn your prizes!
